CustomField.description: Used for Xactly auditing only. Only applicable for the current month.
CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND(
OR ( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Remorse Refund"), ISPICKVAL( Type , "Rebate") ),
Owner.UserRole.Name <> Owner_Role_Copy__c ),
TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used for Xactly auditing only. Only applicable for the current month.
CustomField.label: Returns from Prior Role Check
